column5: Seahorse cabin is close to the beach, fishing piers, the Big Tree, within a mile of 3 boat ramps, Goose Island State Park & Copano Bay State fishing pier. You're only 5 miles from Rockport which has a public beach, Maritime Museum, free Aquarium, and tons of wonderful restaurant options. Youâ€™ll love our place because of the big lot and beautiful views you'll have while staying out in quiet Lamar. Our place is good for couples, hunters, fishers, solo adventurers and families (with kids).
